document_data.name: Chaumyk Vorn
document_data.Abilities: As a high-ranking Red Wizard and skilled [[evoker]], Chaumyk was talented in the use of [[evocation]] [[spell]]s that could be highly destructive in battle.
document_data.Activities: Chaumyk Vorn held the position of [[khazark]] in the [[Thayan enclave (Hillsfar)|Thayan enclave]] of [[Hillsfar]].
document_data.History: In [[1371 DR]], land for a new Thayan enclave were purchased in Hillsfar with permission from [[Maalthiir]]. By [[1372 DR]], Chaumyk was the khazark of this new enclave but he was soon replaced in [[1373 DR]] by [[Tola Vrass]].
